summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 9, 2019, discussing travel arrangements for an FBI Special Agent (SFI) to accompany a squad to St. Thomas in furtherance of a forfeiture action related to the Epstein case. The email seeks approval and coordination for the agent to travel on the Bureau's Q400 plane.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI Special Agent who is the Asset Forfeiture Coordinator for the New York Forfeiture Asset Seizure Team, requesting travel arrangements to St. Thomas for the Epstein case forfeiture action.

events.title: FBI travel planning for Epstein forfeiture action
events.description: FBI personnel are coordinating travel for a squad and a Special Agent (SFI) to St. Thomas to further a forfeiture action in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively pursuing a forfeiture action related to the Epstein case as of August 2019.
FBI personnel were traveling to St. Thomas in connection with this forfeiture action.
The FBI was using a Bureau-owned Q400 plane for this travel.
The email indicates coordination between the FBI's investigative squad and the Asset Forfeiture team.
